markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 594 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- This twisted and grim-looking staff is adorned with hideous skull and bone motifs. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify necromancy magic. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Necromancy **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_chill touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=35)
  • **1st** [_grim tendrils_](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [_ray of enfeeblement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
  • **2nd** [_deafness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=62), [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131)
Staff of Necromancy (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_blindness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [_vampiric touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
  • **4th** _grim tendrils_, _vampiric touch_
Staff of Necromancy (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** [_cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), _gentle repose_
  • **6th** _grim tendrils_, [_vampiric exsanguination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=353)
name: Staff of Necromancy (Greater)
